title: Spectra Arts & Crafts Glitter, Clear, 4 oz, 1 Jar
description: Pacon Spectra Glitter Sparkling Crystals will bring some sparkle and shine to any project. The hexagon-shaped plastic glitter crystals are non-toxic and conform to ASTM D-4236. The glitter comes conveniently packaged in a plastic dispensing jar with a variety of slot openings so it’s easy to use this glitter without making a mess. This 4-ounce jar of Pacon Spectra Glitter Sparkling Crystals comes in Clear. Pacon Spectra Glitter allows you to let your imagination shine!
